name: Hasson Gerard HILLARD, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: Hasson Gerard HILLARD, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2007, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
929 A.2d 637
Hasson Gerard HILLARD, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 73 MM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 25, 2007.
